name: Trick or Treat from Six Feet!
name_original: Trick or Treat from Six Feet!
description:
In the midst of a global pandemic, children begin rushing your neighborhood in the hopes of getting some sweet sweet candy on Halloween night. Your neighbors have already evacuated, leaving only you to face the horde. In order to prevent them from tearing down your door, you must set up towers to shoot candy at the masses until they are satisfied. Will you be able to survive the night and keep Halloween both fun and safe?

Controls/Info:

Click on a white pedestal to select it and open the shop interface. Click on a tower in the shop to buy and place it on the selected pedestal. Use the upgrade button to upgrade a selected tower's damage, range, and fire rate.  Survive past wave 10 to win!
